name: Sushi Restaurant - Be the Chef and Boss
name_original: Sushi Restaurant - Be the Chef and Boss
description: Be the master to run a sushi restaurant, making different kinds of sushi is fun!  In the game, you will run your own restaurant, customers in a continuous line. You have to quickly learn how to cook a customer's point of sushi, and continue to learn and launch a variety of new. At the time of production also need to pay attention to the customer's waiting patiently, and continue to add raw materials. With the increase in customers, you may need to automatically receivables, advanced purchase phone and other props to upgrade to meet the business needs. Perhaps you also need to decorate the restaurant, to attract more customers to visit, to create a famous restaurant!
